com.orsoncharts.graphics3d

Interface Drawable3D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Chart3D, DefaultDrawable3D

    public interface Drawable3D
    A three dimensional scene that can be viewed from an arbitrary viewpoint and rendered to any Graphics2D instance. The Chart3D class implements this interface.
    See Also:
    Panel3D

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderingInfo draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds)
      Draws the scene to the supplied Graphics2D target.
      Dimension3D getDimensions()
      Returns the dimensions of the 3D object.
      double getProjDistance()
      Returns the projection distance.
      Offset2D getTranslate2D()
      Returns the 2D offset for the scene.
      ViewPoint3D getViewPoint()
      Returns the view point.
      void setProjDistance(double dist)
      Sets the projection distance.
      void setTranslate2D(Offset2D offset)
      Sets the translation offset.
      void setViewPoint(ViewPoint3D viewPoint)
      Sets a new view point.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimensions

        Dimension3D getDimensions()
        Returns the dimensions of the 3D object.
        Returns:
        The dimensions.

      • getViewPoint

        ViewPoint3D getViewPoint()
        Returns the view point.
        Returns:
        The view point (never null).

      • setViewPoint

        void setViewPoint(ViewPoint3D viewPoint)
        Sets a new view point. Note that the ViewPoint3D class is implemented so that its position and orientation can be updated directly, so you should use this method only when you want to set an entirely new view point.
        Parameters:
        viewPoint - the view point (null not permitted).

      • getProjDistance

        double getProjDistance()
        Returns the projection distance. The default value is 1500, higher numbers flatten out the perspective and reduce distortion in the projected image.
        Returns:
        The projection distance.
        Since:
        1.2

      • setProjDistance

        void setProjDistance(double dist)
        Sets the projection distance.
        Parameters:
        dist - the distance.
        Since:
        1.2

      • getTranslate2D

        Offset2D getTranslate2D()
        Returns the 2D offset for the scene.
        Returns:
        The translation (never null).

      • setTranslate2D

        void setTranslate2D(Offset2D offset)
        Sets the translation offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset (null not permitted).

      • draw

        RenderingInfo draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                   java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds)
        Draws the scene to the supplied Graphics2D target.
        Parameters:
        g2 - the graphics target (null not permitted).
        bounds - the bounds (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        Information about the rendering.
